data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rahayu, Sri, Rodda, Michele (2019): Hoya of Sumatra, an updated checklist, three new species, and a new subspecies. European Journal of Taxonomy 508: 1-23, DOI: 10.5852/ejt.2019.508|65 occurrences
